Our first video: How to build an NFT drop is now live!

This thread will save you 💰💰💰

RT nader dabit (🧱, 🚀) | sha.eth | nader.sol
With Arweave you can permanently store and then forever access files, images, videos, etc with a single transaction fee

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT 🐙 peth needs your eth
Alright alright, let me properly introduce myself, 
explain why I'm here & why @MetaFam is my life.
I'm just some random guy,
son of a plumber hodling a middle income family in a mid-range country.
Average by all measures...
🐙 peth needs your eth: Hello twitter frens, 
If you appreciate what I do, maybe time to show some support 😇
If you've been following me but still don't know what I do... What are you even doing? 🤷‍♂️
Now unfollow me or check out this short thread 🙃👇
 https://twitter.com/MetaFam/status/1494033105635717124
